title: Tecnology Specialist
description: As a Technology Specialist at Grupo Boticario, I had the oportunity to help the development of integrations between vendors and internal technologies. I helped through the validation and homologation process of a few market tools related to Money Laundering Prevention.

title: Senior Front End Developer
description: Responsible for the development of backoffice dashboards and fraud prevention interactive dashboards. Worked in documenting and preparing documentation for dashboards of Money Laundering Prevention.

title: Development Consultant
description: During my worktime at thoughtworks I was able to work on several projects with cutting edge tecnologies always looking for an extraordinary impact. Alongside with an extremely multicultural team, it was possible for us to deliver a very advanced project for one of the biggest world players in retail services.

title: Software Developer
description: During the time at Join Tecnologia, I was part of a team focused on delivering a high quality product for a big player in Brazilian national education. In a short period of time we were able to deliver a product that fulfilled all the client`s requests.

title: Web Developer
description: My period at Web Global was a period of huge growth, mostly because I had the oportunity to bring some technology inovation. I had the oportunity to work in high availabilty services and products. Worked as a full stack developer but mostly focusing on front end development.I created and updated landing pages and Big Data analisis dashboards.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: My first experience as a developer on this team was being a part of the support team. Later on I was moved to the integrations team. Team where I had the oportunity to work on a few plataforms such as Magento, Wordpress, WooCommerce, Loja Integrada and Prestashop
